title: ChatGPT and Enterprise data with Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Search
description: A chat app using Python, Azure OpenAI Service, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) in Azure AI Search to get answers about employee benefits at a fictitious company.
author: Natalia Venditto

title: ChatGPT and Enterprise data with Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Search
description: A chat app using JavaScript, Azure OpenAI Service, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) in Azure AI Search to get answers about rental properties.
author: Natalia Venditto

title: ChatGPT and Enterprise data with Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Search
description: a chat app using C#, Azure OpenAI Service, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) in Azure AI Search to get answers about employee benefits at a fictitious company.
author: Natalia Venditto
